description.en: The M+ Outline Fonts Project develops a superfamily set of several families: 4 families with proportional Latin, 3 with fixed-halfwidth Latin, and 2 with fixed-fullwidth Japanese Kana variations. This set, M+ 1p, are fonts with proportional Latin and fixed-fullwidth Japanese, and 7 weights from Thin to Black. The Kana have contrasting straight lines and hand-drawn curves. The Latin is aimed to be a sophisticated and relaxed design.

quote.ja: 日常的に使うための飽きのこない、それでいてちょっと気になるデザイン。

description.en: The Rounded M+ Project develops versions of the M+ Fonts with rounded terminals. This set, Rounded M+ 1c, are fonts with proportional Latin and fixed-fullwidth Japanese, and 7 weights from Thin to Black. The Kana have traditional slightly curved strokes. The Latin is optimized to be well-proportioned for text typesetting.

quote.ja: 明るく伸びやかなデザインを心がけた。
quote.en: I intended a design that is openminded and relaxed.

description.en: Hannari, from typingart, is an original Kana design inspired by a historical design, Tsukiji. The Kana have a soft and gentle appearence that is elegant and dynamic. It is well balanced classical deign, with a feminine touch. A classic design.

quote.ja: 明朝体は墨溜まりを意識してデザインしています。
quote.en: This Mincho style keeps and includes the visual impression of ink spots.

description.en: Kokoro Mincho (こころ明朝), from typingart, has the subtle touch of handwriting. With long and low-contrast strokes, round terminals, and wide spacing, it has a gentle and calm appearence.

quote.ja: 少しほっそりとした、角丸な明朝体です。まろやかで、軽い感じがする文字です。
quote.en: A slim Mincho face with rounded endings. The characters look smooth and light.

description.en: Sawarabi Mincho (さわらび明朝) is a Japanese font by mshio. With a delicate and beautiful design, it is suitable for text and headline usage. It already has many hiragana, katakana, ruled lines, and so on, but it does not yet have enough kanji glyphs. Only 2,250 kanji are available in this version, and the project is under active development.

quote.ja: 本文用のフォントとして使いやすくなるようにイメージしています。
quote.en: Designed and optimised as text type.

description.en: Sawarabi Gothic (さわらびゴシック) is a Japanese font by mshio. Carefully designed for high legibility, it works well in small text sizes. It already has many hiragana, katakana, ruled lines, and so on, but it does not yet have enough kanji glyphs. Only 4,469 kanji are available in this version, and the project is under active development.

quote.ja: 本文用のフォントとして使いやすくなるようにイメージしています。
quote.en: Designed and optimised as text type.

description.en: Nico Moji (ニコモジ) is a cute and playful Japanese font, with flat and wide Katakana and Hiragana.

quote.ja: すこしでもデザインのてだすけになれればさいわいです。
quote.en: I hope to do a cotribution to designers with this typeface.

description.en: Nikukyu (ニクキュウ) is a fun and playful Japanese font, inspired by the soft pads of cat paws: each character is equipted with a highlight spot. The spaces between horizontal strokes are small and tight, so this font is best used in large sizes.

quote.ja: モリっとして、ツヤのあるカタカナフォントです。

description.en: Noto helps to make the web more beautiful across platforms for all languages. Currently, Noto covers over 30 scripts, and will cover all of Unicode in the future. This is the Sans Japanese family. It has Regular and Bold styles and is hinted.

quote.ja: 誰でも、気軽に使ってほしいです。
quote.en: I hope people will enjoy using this typeface.
